Uses of Class
ghm.follow.search.SearchableTextPane

Packages that use SearchableTextPane
ghm.follow.gui GUI application which permits one to monitor text files to which information is being added asynchronously.

Fields in ghm.follow.gui declared as SearchableTextPane

          Text area into which followed file's contents are printed
 

Methods in ghm.follow.gui that return SearchableTextPane
